name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Florida Canyon Project in Nevada, United States dated November 2018

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Florida Canyon Project in Nevada, United States dated November 2018
document.description: The report provides a technical assessment and life of mine plan for the Florida Canyon Gold Mine, including mineral resource and reserve estimates, with descriptions of the geological setting, mining methods, and environmental impacts.
